title: Upcycled flour replacement introduced at IFT FIRST - BakingBusiness.com
summary: Renewal Mill has launched a 100% upcycled flour blend called RenewALL, which can be used as a direct replacement for all-purpose flour in baking applications. This blend is made from a combination of upcycled ingredients and provides more fiber and protein per serving than whole wheat flour. It is designed to simplify product development and accelerate the adoption of upcycled ingredients in the food industry.

title: Food product quality, environmental and personal characteristics affecting consumer perception toward food - Frontiers
summary: This article explores the factors that influence consumer perception of food, focusing on how sensory attributes, packaging, and personal and environmental factors like religion, health, and age play a role.  The article analyzes the impact of consumer acceptance on the food industry, highlighting how consumer characteristics, purchasing situations, and product attributes shape purchase decisions.  Finally, the article examines consumer approaches to innovative food products, including upcycled foods, lab-grown meat, and 3D printed food, emphasizing the need for education and awareness to overcome consumer neophobia.
